brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this registry is to provide information, in day-to-day practice, on Plerixafor
      prescription modalities in France, over a 13-month period in order to address the health
      authorities' request.

clinical_study.brief_title: Registry of Patients Treated With Plerixafor (Mozobil®) for Haematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization Before Autologous Transplantation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients treated with Plerixafor for autologous transplantation between November 2011
             and November 2012

          -  Patients who have been informed and who have given their written consent for the
             access to their medical file

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients already included in a Plerixafor ongoing clinical trial.

study_pop.textblock:
The selection of the registry's participants will be based on an exhaustive request of all
        apheresis centers distributed in the French territory.

intervention.description: Plerixafor will be prescribed independently by the physician, according to usual practice.

clinical_study.official_title: Investigator Centers Will Be All French Hematology Centers Performing Autologous Transplantation and Prescribing Mozobil in Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization Willing to Participate In This Study

oversight_info.authority: France: Direction Générale de la Santé

primary_outcome.measure: The characteristics of the patients who received treatment
Number of CD34+ cells collected following treatment
Number of patients with the existence of one or more predictive factors of poor mobilisation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
